member.name: T:FaceDetection.Controllers.FaceDetectionController
member.summary: Get rectangles of face area from specified image

member.name: M:FaceDetection.Controllers.FaceDetectionController.Locations(FaceDetection.Models.Image)
member.summary: Returns an enumerable collection of face location correspond to all faces in specified image.

member.name: T:FaceDetection.Models.FaceArea
member.summary: Describes the left, top, right and bottom location of a face.

member.name: P:FaceDetection.Models.FaceArea.Bottom
member.summary: The y-axis value of the bottom of the rectangle of face.

member.name: P:FaceDetection.Models.FaceArea.Left
member.summary: The x-axis value of the left side of the rectangle of face.

member.name: P:FaceDetection.Models.FaceArea.Right
member.summary: The x-axis value of the right side of the rectangle of face.

member.name: P:FaceDetection.Models.FaceArea.Top
member.summary: The y-axis value of the top of the rectangle of face.
